changelog:
* Reset Tropic and retry command when alarm mode is detected.
* Introduce wear leveling of mac-and-destroy slots in Tropic.
* Added version build number to Features message.
* Update Regulatory screen in the device menu.
* Allow loading translations with different BUILD_VERSION.
* Change bootscreen homebar text to 'Unlock'.
* Fixed address chunkification in certain cases.
* Fixed side-channel vulnerability in BIP-39 mnemonic processing.
